website_summaries.verdict: This curved set offers an immersive experience with a wide viewing angle.
pros: High dynamic range shows deep blacks and bright whites and lighter colors
Set offers depth enhancing technology for greater perspective
cons: Black and dark scenes can appear glitchy
Settings are difficult to achieve, and only look good for certain content

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC
customer_reviews.text: FANTASTIC. This is replacing a 52" samsung 1080p TV that I absolutely love but this TV has stolen all my attention. Black levels are shockingly amazing. HDR on my Xbox One X is just incredible. We have two tv's in the living room and the difference on the same game is incredibly obvious. Brights are flawless, darks are pitch black, and colors just pop like you won't believe. I could not be happier and the One Connect box makes cord management a dream. The numberless remote could take some getting used to but I only use this TV attached to an xbox so the remote rarely gets used for anything.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: phenomenal
customer_reviews.text: I encountered QLED curved screen by accident while walking through local electronic warehouse store, and was extremely impressed. Finally ordered one here on Amazon. It is amazing and I love it. Also, was never overwhelmed by curved screen before but it definitely is worth it on this QLED. Added bonus surprise: The sound is extremely good, much better than my other big screen, and my QLED is the 2017 model. My understanding is that sole difference between 2017 and 2018 QLED model is even further improved sound. 2017 model is already excellent TV sound.
customer_reviews.author: DRM

customer_reviews.title: Will blow you away.
customer_reviews.text: WOW! Replaced my curved 1st gen 4k with this and was floored by the difference. Even cable TV looks almost 4k. X-box one S...took my breath away with the rendering...
customer_reviews.author: Tyrone J. Frey

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY SAMSUNG TV
customer_reviews.text: Had the TV less than a year before the screen went blank. Samsung warranty support is no help! They won't come out to fix my TV because I cannot access the serial number because the TV is wall mounted. I kept explaining that I cannot reach the serial number because I did not mount the TV nor do I have the technical skill. WILL NEVER EVER EVER BUY ANOTHER SAMSUNG PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Adams

customer_reviews.title: The future is here now
customer_reviews.text: One of Samsung's best achievements very strong built and excellent design easy to set up and use super clear cambered screen with 4K picture technology simply one of the best out there !
customer_reviews.author: S. Grosz

customer_reviews.title: Great display. Be very careful when removing the side screen protectors after setup.
customer_reviews.text: On my second unit as the first one arrived with some damage to the display. (Amazon really stepped up though and got me a replacement asap since I purchased overnight shipping on the first unit and sent UPS to pickup the defective one). I really do love this TV. It's a pretty amazing picture quality and the one connect is seamless. Spent more than expected but it's well worth the price if you can afford it. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: I love the the TV
customer_reviews.text: I love the the TV, unfortunately it seems to recently developed a popping noise in the sound, other than that I love everything about it....except the sound. If it would have started before the 30 days had passed I probably would have sent it back, unfortunately it started after the trial period. I have to be honest, it was advertised as "new used", probably why whoever had it before me sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: paul couture

customer_reviews.title: my first smart TV and it is awesome
customer_reviews.text: my first smart TV and it is awesome. I love that I can watch netflix and Prime videos directly from the tv. Picture quality is very good and the curve is nice too.
customer_reviews.author: David Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great TV from a great brand, price a bit expensive though
customer_reviews.text: TV is really cool, I use it in my living room. Colors are amazing, but I wouldn’t expect otherwise from such a big brand. Remote control buttons though started wearing off pretty soon to a reddish color almost like rust. Called Samsung and they replaced it. Even though the new remote works properly, it was not the same great looking as the original one, not the same product. Oh well...
customer_reviews.author: Castle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great picture quality but communicates with the web a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis M. Prody

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tv a must buy if you are looking to go to 4k
customer_reviews.text: This tv is amazing to look at. It’s view is crystal clear from all angles due to the curve the hdr makes a huge difference in picture clarity. I have been looking to move to the 4K era and I am not disappointed in this tv. The only thing I don’t always enjoy is the one connect box automatically turning on my xbox one
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and Easy to Use Smart TV
customer_reviews.text: High quality picture with sleek product design. Easy to set-up instructions and easy to navigate apps. Plenty of customization options to switch between gaming mode, movies, and TV shows to get the best quality display. One Connection helps remove the clutter and visibility of having power cords and HDMI cables going directly into the TV, adding to the sleek design of this TV. Overall, highly satisfied with this TV!
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Better than OLED
customer_reviews.text: I've been watching it for a couple of weeks and playing xbox x. I gotta say this is better than OLED. I wish it had a magic remote and Harmon speakers but the picture is so much better and it won't burn in.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis H.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing TV
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality is nothing short of stunning. Love the curved screen. Love that all the I/O connectors are on a separate box, not on the back of the TV. The design looks fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Best TV on the market
customer_reviews.text: Good brightness and contrast and higher quality picture. It's fast and so it's good for pc gaming as well.
customer_reviews.author: theheartofwinter

customer_reviews.title: Is there an update that can fix the remote so it works all the time?
customer_reviews.text: Best tv (Q7C) made however the remote keeps loosing its settings. Voice control needs considerable work to be satisfactory. It just has certain functions that come and go, like the remote just stops functioning
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: 2 year old paper weight. Samsung quality control has slipped
customer_reviews.text: After 2 years and 1 month. The unit experienced a board failure . The board itself costs more than buying this same tv now, new. Samsung obviously has production quality control issues. This was the 3rd Samsung I’ve owned. It will be the last now.
customer_reviews.author: Clay Stubblefield

customer_reviews.title: Bad picture
customer_reviews.text: The tv delivered to me was missing the cover terminal while there were finger-prints on the screen yet the seller (video and audio center) claimed it was brand new. Now am experiencing shaky picture quality but Samsung will not repair because of the finger-prints. DISSAPOINTING!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: You had one job
customer_reviews.text: Guys . I bought this TV with a lot of excitement . For the price i was paying and the caliber of this TV i truly thought it was going to be amazing... and it was ... it got shipped on time it arrived 2 days later ... everything went great ... That’s until i turned it on... the tv was labeled as new. Well in this case i didn’t know new meant it would have a huge brown spot going entirely down the middle . Thanks Vanns.
customer_reviews.author: Hugo Sanchez-Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Much better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Picture is incredible. Much better than expected. Almost looks fake. Takes a little getting used to. You see a lot more details on all shows. Feels like your there.
customer_reviews.author: Ms30mm

customer_reviews.title: Breaks
customer_reviews.text: After having the tv for 2 years it stopped working!!
customer_reviews.author: Ned Alatin

customer_reviews.title: Truely love it.
customer_reviews.text: Everyone who saw this TV wanted one. Truely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Saifuddin Fakhruddin

customer_reviews.title: I WISH I COULD GIVE IT 5 STARS
customer_reviews.text: This TV was one of the most beautiful TVs I've ever laid my eyes upon. The picture quality is superb; the speakers are great; the curve makes it viewable from almost any angle. Gorgeous colour too. However, I had to move this TV across town, which only took 15 minutes. And in that time the screen cracked, and now my TV is a giant paperweight. So BE WEARY IF YOU MORE WITH THIS TV. IT IS VERY VERY FRAGILE. I wrapped it up in blankets and treated it better than my son, and it still cracked. Other than that. Great TV.
customer_reviews.author: Trevyn Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money!!!
customer_reviews.text: Samsung has done it again. I am a Samsung nut with electronics to include kitchen appliances. This television has brilliant colors, easy to set up, and it mirrors my other Samsung devices like the tablets and phones. The curve in the tv still draws me into the picture and adds, even if some think it is a novelty, some depth to the movies we watch. I even added a Sonos playbar and sub and I have created a masterpiece in my family room. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: E. Spruill

customer_reviews.title: BLUE LINE AND COLOR SHIFT APPEARED AFTER 8 MONTHS! AMAZON IS TRASH!!
customer_reviews.text: DONT EVER EVER EVER THINK ABOUT BUYING A TV FROM AMAZON. ID BE SURPRISED IF THEY WERE ACTUALLY AUTHENTIC UNITS. BLUE LINE APPEARED ON MY SCREEN AN DTHEN COLORS STARTED SHIFTING SHADES. THE THING WAS SET UP AND NOT TOUCHED SINCE IT CAME OUT OF THE BOX. JUST CRAPPED OUT. I CALL AMAZON AND THERES NOTHING THEY CAN DO AND TELL ME TO CONTACT SAMSUNG MYSLEF. WHAT A HOAX. I KNEW I SHOULDVE JUST WENT TO BEST BUY AND GRABBED ONE MYSELF. NEVER AGAIN WILL I BUY A TV FROM THIS PIECE OF JUNK SITE THAT SELLS NOTHING BUT JUNK CRAMMED IN A WAREHOUSE SOMEWHERE
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Bozzuto

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful picture form all angles
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful picture form all angles. Sharp, colorful. However, it started turning off and back on, after 3 months. Samsung's warranty is less sharp. They send you the part. First it was 2 - 3 days. Then it was 10 calendar days. Then 14. Wrong part, still doing the same problem, except now the remote is not working. So now they will send a tech, not a Samsung Tech. Private company. Has to order the parts without looking at the TV. This company is very busy, 10 days out. Almost a month without my TV. Very disappointed. If I had bought this TV at a local store I could have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Goode

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: WOW is the best I can say! This TV has exceed what I expected and is great to watch. If feels and looks like you are right there in whatever you are watching. The apps are good. There are a few I would like to see added but over all this is a fantastic TV. The connection is intuitive and expansive overall.
customer_reviews.author: LAM

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and support options.
customer_reviews.text: TV arrived. The screen size was cutoff on both sides. Tried all option and nothing worked. Called Samsung and after several tries they said they’ll ship me a USB to update the software and if that doesn’t work then I’m basically SOL. Which means I have to go to the buyer (Amazon in this case) and figure it out. Not a problem to return if this was a 5lbs item. Huge problem at the size of this thing. I’d think a TV at this price would have been better tested.
customer_reviews.author: Bassel Ojjeh

customer_reviews.title: This TV has the best picture I have ever seen
customer_reviews.text: I've had 3 Samsung TV's. Two 55 inch one of them 3d. This TV has the best picture I have ever seen. The 4k looks like you're right there in the picture. The color is be on belief. So real. I also love the fact that it only has one wire going to it everything is plugged into a box one wire from the box to the tv and the remote runs everything I need to turn on.
customer_reviews.author: steven powell

customer_reviews.title: Picture is great, set up was easy but takes awhile to ...
customer_reviews.text: Picture is great, set up was easy but takes awhile to navigate and learn, it would be great if it had a cd for dummy's that came with it, still having issues getting the universal remote function to work but I am sure its the user not having taking time to go online and read the how to's
customer_reviews.author: Daryl A Myers

customer_reviews.title: The One connect box and the one remote.
customer_reviews.text: The one connet box, one remote and The 4k picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Samsung Electronics QN65Q7C Curved 65-Inch 4K Ultra HD Smart QLED TV (2017 Model)
product_meta.description: Size:65-Inch| Style:TVIntroducing Curved QLED TV, you’ll immediately notice a difference. Experience a brilliant picture, enhanced by a billion unique colors created by Samsung’s proprietary Quantum Dots. As smart as it is beautiful, QLED TV senses which devices are plugged in and controls them with one remote, giving you an incredibly intuitive TV experience. The Invisible Connection simplifies connections to the TV. Watch it all on a gorgeous TV that 360 Degree Design that elegantly fits into your home, whether mounted on the wall or on a TV stand.
feature_bullets: Revel in brilliant whites and layers of depth, revealed even in the deepest, darkest nights. That’s Q contrast
Designed with a no-bezel screen that spills over the edge, the Q looks gorgeous from every side, whether mounted on the wall or on a stand
Absolutely stunning blacks reveal secrets in the shadows with elite detail
Easily access your favorite content and control connected TV devices from one source using the Samsung Smart Remote.Typical Power Consumption:90
Get more than a billion colors and 100% color volume with exclusive new Quantum Dots; Depth Enhancing Technology : Auto Depth Enhancer

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars85 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
